mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking_coupon_car (pcc_id, coupon_name, shop_name, community_id,ext_pcc_id,pa_id,car_num, give_way,type_cd,value,state,remark,start_time,end_time) VALUES (#{pccId}, #{couponName}, #{shopName}, #{communityId},#{extPccId},#{paId},#{carNum}, #{giveWay},#{typeCd},#{value},#{state},#{remark},#{startTime},#{endTime})
